definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: The major components of acidic fraction are phenols and organic acids.
sentences.chinese: 酸性組分主要由酚類化合物和有機羧酸組成。

sentences.english: The gingerols from ginger were extracted with supercritical CO2 fluid extraction.
sentences.chinese: 以生薑爲原料，採用超臨界CO2萃取姜酚類化合物。

sentences.english: The possibility of using this electrochemical reaction for polyphenolic compound analysis is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出電化學測試分析多酚類化合物的可能性。

sentences.english: Aldehydic and phenolic compounds are found in cinnamon and mustard.
sentences.chinese: 在肉桂和芥菜中含有醛類和酚類化合物。

sentences.english: This paper presents the experimental results of investigating the composition of phenol compounds of Chinese Larch tree.
sentences.chinese: 研究了混合態的興安落葉松樹木中酚類化合物的組成。

sentences.english: Natural goethite has the ability to degrade phenolic compounds better than synthetic goethite.
sentences.chinese: 天然針鐵礦降解酚類化合物的能力高於合成針鐵礦。

sentences.english: The analytic method of phenols in water was introduced in detail.
sentences.chinese: 詳細介紹了水中酚類化合物的測定方法。

sentences.english: No chlorinated phenolic compounds was found in the hypochlorite effluents.
sentences.chinese: 次氯酸鹽漂白段廢液中的氯代酚類化合物含量極少。

sentences.english: Caffeic acid is another phenolic compound found in grapes.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡酸是葡萄中含有的另一種酚類化合物。
